description: This file defines a Next.js page component for displaying detailed recipe information, including static route generation, dynamic metadata, and rendering of recipe details with external API and data references.

methods.name: generateStaticParams
methods.description: Generates static route parameters for all recipes by fetching all recipes and mapping their IDs for static generation.

methods.name: generateMetadata
methods.description: Fetches recipe data based on route parameters to generate dynamic metadata such as title, description, and open graph info.
